title: Dage - Novel Updates

tags: Absent Parents   Adapted to Drama CD   Adopted Children   Age Progression   Child Abuse   Clingy Lover   Cold Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Gangs   Loner Protagonist   Past Trauma   Persistent Love Interests   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Possessive Characters   Siblings   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Single Parent   Tragic Past   Younger Love Interests

description:
Youth Wei Qian, orphaned at thirteen or fourteen, struggles through life with a half-sister. He picks up a street child who shamelessly latches onto him and gives him the name Xiaoyuan.

Wei Qian dreams of rising above the crop. He is someone who values money over his own life. In the earlier part of his life, he battles against many obstacles, with his number one mission being to make a name for himself. Finally, when he achieves some success and thinks that heâ€™s seeing the light of daybreak in life, Xiaoyuan suddenly goes crazy.>
